title: Georgia’s economy growing rapidly but still trails EU peers - PM
description:

title: Georgia on track for rapid economic growth - PM
description:
“By the end of 2025, Georgia’s economy will exceed 100 billion lari, and nominal GDP per capita will surpass 10,000 dollars,” Kobakhidze said at a cabinet meeting, News.Az reports, citing Georgian media.

description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) on Thursday announced that it has been selected by the Georgia Department of Labor (GDOL) to replace its 1980s-era legacy platform with a cloud-based unemployment insurance system that streamlines the claims process and ensures that eligible individuals receive prompt...
